name: Rogueball
description:
A rogue-like soccer game where you must kick the ball to defeat your enemies.... Or, you can just score a goal for the win...

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space to kick
  • Hold shift to run

Made for Ludum Dare 41

Credits:

  • Lee Tran - @cltran86 (Programming, UI, Design) 
  • Mike Romaniak @mikeromaniak (2d art, sound)

3D Models taken from poly,google.com

  • Soccer ball by Smirnoff Alexander
    - https://poly.google.com/view/57u6P7Sr7K0
  • Traffic Cone by Adam Marc Williams - https://poly.google.com/view/eFQ60hneKwL
